component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: Display the status of LLDP on R1.

command.instruction:
Enter Global Configuration mode to configure the following:
  • Enable LLDP globally on R1.
  • Disable LLDP on interface S0/0/0.
  • Use end command to exit Global Configuration mode.
<font face="_sans"><b>Display the list of LLDP neighbors on S1.</font>
